profile.name: Kevin Stradtman
profile.title: Full Stack JavaScript, Python, and C# developer
bio: Born in Cincinnati Ohio and still live here.
Went through training at Coding Dojo to get my certificate in Python and C#.
Obtained about 11 certificates through Coursera ranging from Data Science in Python to Microsoft Excel
Working towards a JavaScript tech-degree to advance my skills.
Went through about 70 courses on Udemy ranging from 30 to 50 hours of video time each
Motivated developer, spending all day on my computer is the life to live.
